channel.title: 1 Question's I need answered!
channel.description: I just made 2 new bosses on my server and I was wondering how I can make it say. "Dad has been slain by someone (Level-5)"? That is just an example.

item.title: 1 Question's I need answered!
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 221) { server.playerHandler .yell("The Black Knight Titan has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 795) { server.playerHandler .yell("The Ice Queen has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 50) { server.playerHandler .yell("King Black Dragon has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 117) { server.playerHandler .yell("General Graardor has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 3200) { server.playerHandler .yell("The Chaos Elemental has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")"); } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) { server.playerHandler .yell("The Kalphite Queen has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")"); }

Read full topic

item.title: 1 Question's I need answered!
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Go to Npchandler.java
Search for: IsDead == true
Then add this:

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == ID OF MONSTER) { // INFO npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just slain Dad!");
